      • registerSlot

        public static void registerSlot(int slotOffset,
                                MissionSpecificPalletFragment.Slot slot)
        Allow for other utilities to register up to 4 additional point dropper capabilities within the mission tab.
        Parameters:
        slotOffset - the current slot to register a pallet icon [0..3]
        slot - the image to place in the slot
